project.name: MERN Stack Kanban Board
project.description: A complete task management application with drag-and-drop functionality

phases.name: Project Setup & Backend Foundation
phases.description: Set up the basic project structure, database schema, and core backend APIs

milestones.name: Project Structure Setup
milestones.description: Initialize backend and frontend projects with proper folder structure
tasks: Set up MongoDB connection and configuration
Initialize React frontend with Vite/Create React App

milestones.name: Database Schema Design
milestones.description: Design and implement MongoDB collections and models
tasks: Create User model (id, name, email, passwordHash)
Create Board model (id, title, ownerId, columns)
Create Task model (id, boardId, title, description, status, priority, dueDate, labels, createdAt)
Set up Mongoose schemas and validation
acceptanceCriteria: All models defined with proper validation

milestones.name: Core Backend APIs
milestones.description: Implement basic CRUD operations for boards and tasks
tasks: Create board CRUD endpoints (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE)
Create task CRUD endpoints (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE)
Add proper error handling and validation
Set up CORS for frontend communication

phases.name: Frontend Foundation & Basic UI
phases.description: Build the basic React frontend with core components and API integration

milestones.name: Frontend Project Setup
milestones.description: Set up React project with necessary dependencies and routing
tasks: Set up React Router for navigation

milestones.name: Core Components
milestones.description: Build essential UI components for boards, columns, and tasks
tasks: Create Board component with column layout
Create Column component with task list
Create Task component with basic styling
Create Modal component for task details
acceptanceCriteria: Responsive design works on mobile and desktop

milestones.name: API Integration
milestones.description: Connect frontend components to backend APIs
tasks: Implement board CRUD operations in frontend
Implement task CRUD operations in frontend
Add loading states and error handling
acceptanceCriteria: Frontend can create, read, update, delete boards and tasks

phases.name: Drag & Drop Implementation
phases.description: Implement drag-and-drop functionality for tasks and columns

milestones.name: Task Drag & Drop
milestones.description: Enable dragging tasks between columns with status updates
tasks: Update task status when dropped in new column
Add visual feedback during drag operations
acceptanceCriteria: Tasks can be dragged between columns
Task status updates automatically in database
Visual feedback works during drag operations
Drag operations are smooth and responsive

milestones.name: Column Reordering
milestones.description: Enable reordering of columns by dragging
tasks: Add visual indicators for drop zones
acceptanceCriteria: Columns can be reordered by dragging
UI updates reflect new column order

milestones.name: Drag & Drop Polish
milestones.description: Add animations and improve drag-and-drop UX
tasks: Add smooth animations for drag operations
Add keyboard accessibility for drag operations
Test drag and drop on different devices
acceptanceCriteria: Drag and drop works on touch devices

phases.name: Advanced Features
phases.description: Implement search, filtering, and task management features

milestones.name: Search & Filtering
milestones.description: Implement task search and filtering capabilities
tasks: Implement filtering by priority, labels, due date
acceptanceCriteria: Users can search tasks by title and description
Filtering works by all specified criteria

milestones.name: Task Management Features
milestones.description: Add priority, labels, due dates, and task details
tasks: Create date picker for due dates
Add task validation and error handling
acceptanceCriteria: Task details can be edited in modal
Priority, labels, and due dates work properly

milestones.name: Data Export
tasks: Create export service for board data
Add export button to board interface
Test export with various board configurations
acceptanceCriteria: Users can export board as JSON
Exported data includes all board information
Export works with different board sizes

phases.name: UI/UX Polish & Optional Features
phases.description: Add dark mode, analytics, and other optional enhancements

milestones.name: Dark Mode & Theming
milestones.description: Implement dark mode toggle and theme management
tasks: Test theme switching across all components
acceptanceCriteria: Theme switching is smooth and responsive

milestones.name: Analytics & Activity Log
milestones.description: Add activity tracking and basic analytics
tasks: Implement task count analytics per column
acceptanceCriteria: Activity log tracks all task changes
Activity log is accessible in UI

milestones.name: Authentication (Optional)
tasks: Create user registration and login forms
acceptanceCriteria: Each user sees only their boards

phases.name: Testing & Deployment
phases.description: Comprehensive testing, bug fixes, and deployment preparation

milestones.name: Testing & Bug Fixes
tasks: Write unit tests for critical components
Test drag and drop functionality thoroughly
Fix any bugs found during testing

milestones.name: Documentation & Deployment
milestones.description: Create documentation and prepare for deployment

dependencies.name: MongoDB
dependencies.description: Database for storing boards, tasks, and user data

dependencies.name: react-beautiful-dnd
dependencies.description: Drag and drop library for React

risks.mitigation: Start with simple drag and drop, iterate and improve gradually
Use React Context and custom hooks for state management
Test on multiple browsers and devices

successCriteria: All CRUD operations work for boards and tasks
Drag and drop functionality is smooth and responsive
Application is responsive on mobile and desktop
Performance is acceptable with reasonable data loads
User experience is intuitive and polished
